title: Keen sprites
content:
Wasn't sure if i should have put this topic here, but...
I need the Keen sprites that appear in the story sections of K4-6, you know, those pictures of Keen's face (some are Keen looking normal, keen angry, keen waving goodbye, etc). I don't need Molly, the council page, or any one else's picture, just Keen. There's also some animations of Keen giving a thumbs up and maybe a few more animations like that, I can't remember. Is there any sole source for these pics?- .... . ..- -. .. ...- . .-. ... . .. ... - --- .- ... -

title: Re: Keen sprites
content:
You could extract them with modkeen, but that takes up too much space. Look on [url=http://dosclassics.com/keen]DOSclassics[/url] in the official games section, and look at the story. Other than that, i don't know where to get them.

EDIT: \/ No, i don't think it has the story graphics in it.-Genius314

title: Re: Keen sprites
content:
Heh, they don't take that much space when exported with modkeen. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

Then there's this:
[url=http://dosclassics.com/download/222]dosclassics.com/download/222[/url]
It probably has transparent backgrounds for the sprites and so on, dunno.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Keen sprites
content: yeah just cut out the graphics you need from the folder and delete the rest [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-foot.gif[/img]
